attributes.action: Ban nets on trees or other areas providing a living space for the  envirnoment
attributes.additional_details:
Some links for yuo to review:

https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-england-47627749

attributes.background: As many of you may have noticed in recent news, there is now a new idea by companies hoping to build/expand and to ensure this progress, putting nets over trees and other such areas preventing local wild life from being an obstical by removing their natural home. Please support me by signing.Thanks
